Quetzalcoatl:
 
 
"We're arriving to Ark's area, sir"said the male"Perhaps we should 
stop here and plan our aproach..."

Scourge:

Scourge transformed as his trailor opend releasing the smushed mirage 
and dino bots swoop flew low overhead. "Check foor deffenses, i dont 
want to smudge my paint job because you all trip a trap."

"Ok"replied the male "Do you have a comp, sir?"

Scourge growled to himself. "If i had one would i be asking you?"

Quetzalcoatl:

"You see, sir"replied the male "I  get some intersting datums of 
Ark... some of their defences's datums.. but I need to down loaded 
them in order to see them and work"

Scourge grumbled and kneeled before the dinobot. His chest slid open 
revealing tons of equipent... "Use what you need but make it a small 
file."

Quetzalcoatl:

"Thanks sir" Said the male while he transformed to his robot form for 
first time.  his first tranformation was painful and his bot form was 
terribly ugly,  Quetzalcoatl  has a skully body and he was huncback. 
His Arms were thin and large, almost they reached the floor. His face 
showed his ashame due his own ugly bot form and hi face was skully, 
his eyes have a deep green bright, his golden helmet was decorate in 
that way that it looked like Aztecs' helmet. His metallic skin was 
gray and he had too, large and thin fingers.

Quet started to work quickly, councious that he wans't very handsome, 
but that wasn't important by now

Scourge looked down at the bot. "Your a autobot right?"

Quetzalcoalt:

"A maximal, sir"replied the male

Scourge nodded. "And you know i am a decepticon, and that i once 
tried to kill the bot who lead the auto bots until primal took over?"


Quetzalcoatl:
 
"Yes, sir, History was my Fav subject in High Maximal Militar 
Academy" replied the male"In order to,  prevent any future use to 
this information, I  down loaded a virus that will erase this file, 
just this file,  when I command and if my spark fade... This virus 
won't hurt you... just will erase the file"

Scourge looked down at the small bot. "If it weren't for your 
schooling young one i'd swear you were a decepticon... maybe after 
this you will join me, with your knowledge and my power and skills we 
could topple megatron and rule over all."

Mirage and grimlock became a little edgy as the tried not to listen 
in to hard. "Me grimlock no trust ugly bot, Grimlock no trust Bad 
Prime either./" He let his sword slide out of the tail and ran his 
thumb over it. 

"The same said my teachers"replied the male while he still was 
working "Thunder, that was my maximal name, You're acting as 
decepticon if you won't correct that you will end in a big 
trouble"said mimic a calling down tone"But some times is useful brake 
some rules, when situations needs and other times is better follow 
the rules... But, I'm happy to be a maximal, sir, due my personal 
point of view and a embarrasing situation... I was sent in this 
mission"

"Oh what got you put with the Big bad bot, the dino dummys, and the 
coward?" Scourge chuckled, he knew this was a mission for the big 
boys and the ones they wanted to get rid of."

Quetzalcoatl:

"Well, "said the male" I can't sayt that... I've been a goody 
Maximal "said with EMbarrasing "Well, I not an ortodoxy Maximal.... I 
did some disasters... accidentaly and my Principal tought that I was 
enough smart to a mission but I'm very inmature... They thought,  
that a tought comander and a mission would be enough good  for me to 
grew up... and regarding my knowledge of History, they tuoght that  I 
could be useful"

Scourge nodded. "I'll make you feel right at home kid. "Grimlock walk 
point, if you can survive re-entry, you can survive a cannon booby-
trap."

Grimlock growled and transformed walking ahead.
